sentences.sContent: A crisis has arisen in the Foreign Office.
More problems like those at the nuclear power plant are certain to arise.
sentences.sCn: 核电厂肯定还会出现那样的问题。

sentences.sContent: Several important legal questions arose in the contract negotiations.
sentences.sCn: 合同谈判过程中出现了几个重要的法律问题。

remMethod.val: a ＋ rise(出现， 上升) → 出现

trans.tranOther: if a problem or difficult situation arises, it begins to happen
